content:
Those three KPIs will provide a great snapshot of your team's performance during the event. By focusing on lead generation and quality, event engagement and attendance, and customer satisfaction and experience, you'll get a well-rounded view of your team's strengths and areas for improvement.

By highlighting the marketing coordinator's contributions, you'll be able to showcase their impact on the event's success, particularly in terms of lead generation and social media engagement. This will help to demonstrate the value of their role and the importance of their contributions to the team.

Remember to present the data in a clear and concise manner, using visualizations and charts to make the information easy to understand. This will help to make your report more engaging and effective in communicating the team's performance.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, good luck with your report, and I hope it helps you and your team to celebrate your successes and identify areas for improvement!
